duck: Refresher, in English legal phraseology, a further or additional fee paid to counsel where a case is adjourned from one term or sitting to another, or where it extends over more than one day and occupies, either on the first day or partly on the first and partly on a subsequent day or days, more than five hours without being concluded.
refresher definition: something (as a drink) that refreshes.

milestones: Shuttle launch called off due to faulty fuel tank sensor

wiki.text:
'Refresher', in English legal phraseology, a further or additional fee paid to
counsel where a case is adjourned from one term or sitting to another, or where
it extends over more than one day and occupies, either on the first day or
partly on the first and partly on a subsequent day or days, more than five hours
without being concluded.
wiki.title: refresher
